description:
Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Abkhaz, Acehnese, Acholi, Afar, Afrikaans, Albanian, Alur, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Avar, Awadhi, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Balinese, Baluchi, Bambara, Baoulé, Bashkir, Basque, Batak Karo, WeMuslim is a user-friendly app with delicate and simple interfere and is the favorite of over 50 million Muslims. This app is the perfect companion for Muslims looking to stay on top of their religious obligations anytime, anywhere.

● Prayer times - Based on your current location, this app provides accurate prayer times and plays the magnificent audio of the Athan before each prayer.

● Quran Kareem - Supports audio recitations from various famous reciters and translations in nearly 10 languages and helps you do the Khatam Quran.

● Ummah - You can browse and post your thoughts on reciting the Quran, receive blessings from other Muslims, and raise your questions to be answered by the imam.

● Qibla - This feature provides an easy-to-use compass that points in the direction of the Kaaba.

● Hijri - This feature allows you to look up the Islamic calendar for future prayer times and also provides a function to record your daily prayers.

● Azkar - This feature includes Dua and remembrance based on Hadiths and the Quran, which can be easily read and recited.

● Tasbih - This feature includes an electronic tasbih and prayer beads counter to assist you in keeping count while reading your prayer or Dua.

● Hajj&Umrah - This feature provides the guide for the journey of Hajj, including the explanations and instructions for the ritual.

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.

---------------------------------------------------------

If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at:
support@wemuslim.com

Learn more about WeMuslim at:
https://www.wemuslim.com
---------------------------------------------------------

developer: MINISTRY OF ENDOWMENTS AND RELIGIOUS AFFAIRS
description:
يتيح التطبيق معرفة التاريخ الهجري والتاريخ الميلادي وأوقات الصلاة والتنبيه لها، ومعرفة شكل القمر في كل ليلة وإتجاه القبلة والمساجد القريبة من المستخدم في سلطنة عُمان، ويوفر التطبيق الإطلاع على الحكم المصاحبة.
وتوجد بالتطبيق صفحة خاصة بالخدمات التي تقدمها الوزارة، بالإضافة إلى ميزة التنبيهات التلقائية.

Ayah is a modern, fully-featured Quran app that is beautiful and easy to use.

Ayah's clean, intuitive interface makes for a relaxing reading experience without any visual clutter. It's also fast to help you get back reading as quickly as possible.

With Ayah, you can listen to your favorite Quran recitations, with verse-by-verse highlighting and customizable repeat options.


FEATURES
• The latest edition of the Madinah Mushaf
• Tens of reciters to choose from
• Extensive sharing options
• Khatmah
• Colorful bookmarks
• Starred verses
• Quick searching
• Verse of the day
• Thematic highlighting
• Reminders
• Dark Mode

Translator is your multi-language communication tool, supporting translation between 100+ languages, allowing you to communicate easily in every corner of the world. It not only provides standard text translation, but also provides a variety of powerful functions to meet various language needs.

Feature Highlights:
1. Text translation: Easily realize text translation between languages through keyboard input. No outside help required, everything is under control.
2. Real-time conversation translation: Multi-language conversation is no longer an obstacle. It can instantly translate the words between you and your conversation partner, enabling barrier-free communication.
3. Voice input: If you don’t want to enter text, you can use the voice function to write characters directly on the screen, and they will be translated into text.

Privacy: https://www.merriam-webster.com/i/privacy-policy

developer: DIRECT CURSUS COMPUTER SYSTEMS TRADING LLC
description:
Yandex.Translate
Free translator that can work offline and translate text from photos

• Translate between any pair of the 100 languages when you’re online. 
• Translate from French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Turkish and other languages to English while offline: download these languages for free and enable the offline mode in Settings.
• Speak words or phrases in Russian, English, or Turkish to translate them into any of these languages, or have the app read the translations to you.
• Learn new words and their meanings through usage examples in the app’s dictionary (available for most of the currently supported languages).
• Take a picture of a menu, road sign, book page or choose a photo with text from your Camera Roll to view its translation right over the image (only available when you are online).
• Translate entire sites directly in the app or in Safari.
• Read books, news, or articles in a foreign language together with Yandex.Translate on your iPad using Split View. 
• Read transliterated Arabic, Armenian, Farsi, Georgian, Greek, Hebrew, Korean, Japanese, or Chinese Pinyin.
• Enjoy the app’s time-saving predictive typing function and automated language detection.
• Save translations in Favorites and view your translation history at any time.
• Speak to your Apple Watch to see your words translated on its screen.

Currently supported languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bashkir, Belarussian, Bengali, Bulgarian, Burmese, Bosnian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese, Chuvash, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Elvish (Sindarin), English, Esperanto, Estonian, Farsi, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hill Mari, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Kyrgyz, Latin, Latvian, Lao, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malaysian, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mari, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Papiamento, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Scots, Singhalese, Slovakian, Slovenian, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Udmurt, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yakutian, Yiddish, Zulu.

Azkar App is your daily companion for enhancing spirituality and facilitating Islamic practices. It provides a comprehensive collection of authentic Athkar (remembrances) and supplications from the Qur’an and Sunnah, along with innovative features designed to meet the needs of Muslims in their daily lives.

Join millions of users and experience a complete spiritual journey with Azkar App, crafted to serve every Muslim.

Key Features
- Morning & Evening Athkar, Sleep & Wake-up Athkar, Prayer Athkar, and more: A modern and user-friendly interface with an audio player and repetition counter.
- My Athkar Section: Create and customize your own Athkar according to your needs.
- Qur’an (Reading, Tafsir, and Audio): Enjoy an eye-friendly reading experience with font and color customization, translations in multiple languages, and easy-to-understand Tafsir. You can also listen or download recitations by your favorite reciter.
- Khatmah: Set a Qur’an completion plan with daily reading reminders.
- Prayer Times, Qibla Direction, and Hijri Calendar: View the Islamic calendar, accurate prayer times, and Qibla direction, with a monthly prayer calendar that can be shared.
- Adhan & Full Adhan Alerts: Choose from a variety of Adhan voices with pre-Adhan reminders.
- Reminders Section: Create reminders for specific Athkar, supplications, or important events with customizable sound and repetition options.
- Daily Content Updates: Get Dua of the Day, Ayah of the Day, and Video of the Day with valuable tips and inspiring stories.
- Various Azkar: A variety of supplications with customizable backgrounds, ready for sharing.
- Ramadan Section: Essential Ramadan features including Prayer & Fasting Tracker, Daily Duas, Zakat Calculator, and more.
- Daily Quranic Benefits: Daily insights into Qur’anic verses for contemplation.
- Worship Trackers: Tools to track Athkar, fasting, and prayers, helping you stay consistent and improve commitment.
- Tasbih Counter: Perform electronic Dhikr with an easy-to-use digital Tasbih.
- Ruqyah (Islamic Healing): Authentic Ruqyah texts from the Qur’an and Sunnah, with an audio listening option.
- Prophet Muhammad’s (PBUH) Biography in Videos: Engaging video content about the life of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).
- 99 Names of Allah.
- Surah Al-Kahf Reminder for Fridays.
- Hajj & Umrah Guide: Step-by-step instructions for performing Hajj and Umrah.
- Islamic & Ramadan WhatsApp Stickers: Updated Islamic and Ramadan sticker packs with easy export to WhatsApp.
- Istighfar (Forgiveness) Alerts: Get reminders for seeking forgiveness and making Dhikr at customizable intervals (e.g., every 10 minutes or once a day).
- Qiyam-ul-Layl (Night Prayer) Alerts.
- Live Activities & Widgets: Quick access to features like prayer times, Hijri date, various azkar, Khatmah, prayer tracker, fasting tracker, and more from the home screen and lock screen.
- Professional & Customizable Design: Choose your favorite background, and enable dark mode for a better visual experience.
- …and many more great features you’ll love!

Why Azkar App?
Azkar App is a comprehensive Islamic tool, combining authenticity with modern technology to fulfill your spiritual and daily needs.

Take this opportunity to increase your daily rewards and strengthen your connection with Allah. Download Azkar App now and embark on an uninterrupted spiritual journey filled with Dhikr and supplication.


Privacy Policy:
https://hamzaaa.com/azkar/privacy.html

Terms of Use:
https://hamzaaa.com/azkar/terms-of-use.html

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Most authentic Quran app since 2010.

Recognized by more than 65 million Muslim users around the world.

معترف به من قبل أكثر من ٦٥ مليون مستخدم حول العالم.

Quran Majeed is an amazing Quran app that beautifies your life with the blessing of reading and listening to the Quran on the go. The latest version of the authentic Quran Majeed app for iPhone and iPad offers complete Quran in the elegant Uthmanic script, audio recitation, translations and English Tafsir Uthmani, proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim).
القرآن المجيد هو تطبيق مميز للقرآن الذي يجمل حياتك ببركة القراءة والاستماع إلى القرآن أثناء التنقل. الإصدار الأخير من تطبيق القرآن المجيد لأجهزة الآي فون والآيباد تقدم قرآنًا كاملاً في الكتابة العثمانية الأنيقة، وتلاوة الصوت، والترجمات، والتفاسير، وقام بمراجعته أحد العلماء

● Worldwide Prayer Times clock with Azan/Adhan alarm options. Supports different prayer time calculation methods. Qibla direction. Ramadan Sehar/Iftar times
أوقات الصلاة لجميع أنحاء العالم مع خيار تنبيه الأذان، ودعم طرق مختلفة لحساب أوقات الصلاة، وبوصلة القبلة، وأوقات السحور والإفطار

● World famous reciters (Sheikh Abdul Basit, Sheikh As Sudays & As Shraym, Mishari Rashid, Saad Al Ghamdi, Abu Bakr Shatry, Sheikh Ahmed Ajmi, Sheikh Al-Huzaifi, Sheikh Mahir-al-Muayqali, Sheikh Minshawi, Sheikh Ayub, Khalil Husari, Mahmood AlBana, Salah Bukhatir & Sheikh Basfar).
تلاوات القراء المعروفون عالميا.

● Four English translations (Pickthal, Dr. Mohsin, Mahmood & Yusuf Ali) and forty-five language translations (AlBanian, Amazigh, Amharic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Divehi, Dutch, French, German, Hausa, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malayalam, Malaysian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Sindhi, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tartar, Turkish, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek). 

● Option to display any translation along with full Arabic text in hi-resolution, Retina graphics in both portrait and landscape viewing. Supports pinch/zoom feature for changing font size.
خيار عرض أي ترجمة مع النص العربي الكامل بالدقة الممتازة في وضعي الأفقي والعمودي، دعم ميزة التصغير / التكبير لتغيير حجم الخط.

● Islamic greeting messages (Eid Mubarak, Ramadan Kareem, ...)
رسائل معايدة إسلامية (عيد مبارك، رمضان كريم، ...)

● Qibla Direction — اتجاه القبلة

● Hijri Converter — تحويل التاريخ

● Quran TV feature with beautiful background videos
تلفزيون القرآن مع مقاطع فيديو خلفية جميلة

● Visual Quran feature with flip gesture
المصحف المرئي مع إيماءة التقليب

● Watch live coverage of Makkah & Madinah.
شاهد التغطية المباشرة لمكة المكرمة والمدينة المنورة.

● Selectable themes (Green, Blue, Classic-Green, Night Mode, Light & Brown).
إمكانية اختيار الثيمات (أخضر، أزرق، الوضع الليلي، فاتح، بني)

● Advanced audio options to help with memorization (repetition of ayah, Surah, number of repetitions, interval, and recitation speed).
خيارات الصوت المتقدمة للمساعدة في الحفظ (تكرار الآية، وسورة، وعدد من حالات التكرار، وفاصل، وسرعة التلاوة).

● Highly advanced “Search” feature that can help with searching any word (search exact word, affixes or all roots) in the Arabic text, any of the translations and English Tafsir.

Quran 360 is a comprehensive Al Quran app that offers a complete Quranic experience in the palm of your hand.

With features like
- Tarteel Mistake Detection (NEW)
- The Quran Teacher
- reading the Quran with Tajweed,
- word-by-word tafsir and translation (Quran English),
- listening to famous reciters (Quran Audio),
- creating Quran playlists,
- bookmarking and searching,
- Quran offline mode, and more,
equips you to learn, comprehend, recite, and memorize the Al Quran with ease. Whether you’re a beginner or an advanced learner of the Holy Quran, this app is perfect for you.

Perfect your Quranic Recitation with Tarteel Mistake Detection (NEW)

Our newly introduced Tarteel Mistake Detection feature acts as your personal Quran teacher, alerting you instantly to any missed or incorrect words in your recitation. This powerful tool helps you learn the correct recitation precisely, enhancing your Quranic study and practice.

Your Quran Teacher

With the Quran Teacher, you can ask anything about the Quran and Islam and get answers tailored to your needs, in seconds. This is a great way to strengthen your knowledge and understanding of the Quran and Islam.

Read Al Quran with Tajweed & Offline

Quran 360 is getting ready to take its place in the stores to eliminate difficulties such as the inability to adjust the font sizes, eye-catching designs, and other details that negatively affect the reading experience. It promises a more fluid reading experience.

If you learn the Holy Quran with Tajweed, you will be able to pronounce the Quranic verses correctly, reciting them in Tarteel and your recitation will sound more beautiful.

With Quran 360 app, you will always be able to read Allah's words without making any mistakes. Enjoy the serene recitations and enlightening insights of the Holy Quran even without an internet connection.

Al Quran Audio Mode with Famous Reciters

The most famous aspect of Quran 360’s listening feature is that it includes different reciters. You can listen to every ayah you want from the voices of famous reciters in Quran 360.

You can listen to surahs with recordings of well-known reciters such as Akram Al-Alaqmi (Gapless), Abdul Rashid Sufi, Abdul Muhsin al Qasim, Abdullah Mahrood, and more.

Memorize Quran Fast and Easily

With the ability to enhance the reading speed of the Holy Quran, you have the opportunity to recite the complete book swiftly. This feature proves valuable whether you wish to bypass memorized verses.

The Search in Al Quran Kareem functionality empowers efficient Quran memorization through its user-friendly strategy, effectively recognizing analogous verses (Mutashābihāt) for rapid comprehension.

Bookmarks and Playlists

It is very easy to bookmark surahs, verses, and Tilawat e Quran Kareem wherever you like.

With our playlist feature, you can listen to beautiful Quran playlists directly from the home page and create your own playlist.

Quran Tafsir - Guided Interpretations

Tafsir books demonstrate the real meanings and other details of the Ayah when they are read together with the Quran. You can see why that verse was revealed or after which event it was conveyed to the Prophet Muhammad (SAW).

Use Quran 360 to read different tafsirs and gain a deeper understanding.

Verified Al Quran Translations -  Quran English, قران كريم, Coran, Koran, Al Quran Bangla

It contains 40+ Al Quran Kareem translations, transliterations, and tafsir/commentary.

The application includes translations of many languages ​​such as English, Turkish, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Arabic, Malay, Indonesian, Hindi, Urdu, Bangla, Persian, Bulgarian, Swedish, Italian, and more.

Millions of Muslims around the world use Muslim Assistant app to see prayer times and find Qibla direction.

Muslim Assistant, the most downloaded prayer time application in all Muslim countries, includes many useful features.

MUSLIM ASSISTANT FEATURES

Prayer Times: The application shows you the most accurate azan times according to your location or region. If you want, you can receive prayer time notifications with Azan sound or with other sound options.

Qibla Finder: You can find Mecca and Kaaba on the map, and you can determine the Kaaba direction of your location in the most accurate way. With the help of Compass Mode, It is easy to see where the Kaaba is located even when you are offline, and you can pray according to Islamic rules.

Dhikr Counter: You can easily make dhikrs, record your dhikr counts and dhikr loops.

Friday Messages: You can send special Friday messages to your loved ones.

Nearby Mosques: You can see the Mosques and Masjids closest to your location on the map.

The Quran: You can read the Quran in 40+ different languages and there are also transliteration options. You can see the Juz list and change the text size as well. You have the option to listen to the Quran recited by famous reciters, providing a unique and diverse listening experience.

Kaaba Live Broadcast: You can watch the Kaaba live 24 hours a day.

Esma-ul Husna: You can see the 99 names of Allah and their meanings and listen to Esma hymn and make dhikr of each Name.

Hijri Calendar: You can follow the dates of important islamic days such as Ramadan, Laylat-ul Qadr, Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha.

Message Editor: You can choose existing messages or compose new ones, with a variety of background options, using the editor tool and send your custom messages to your loved ones.

Notes:

For proper Qibla Finder usage, you need to hold your phone on a flat surface and keep it away from electromagnetic fields and metal objects. If it is necessary, you can manually rearrange your location through pressing the marker.

Because the app uses your device's location settings to give you prayer times, please kindly be aware your location settings are open and up to date.

May Allah bless us all.

تطبيق اذكاري صمم ليساعد على جعل الذكر عادة باذن الله

يمكنك الذكر اثناء تصفح الانترنت او اي برنامج تواصل اجتماعي مثل فيس بوك، تويتر، او اينستاغرام
يمكنك اظهار الأذكار اثناء المحادثة مع الاصدقاء على واتس اب، لاين، ڤايبر، فيس بوك، تانغو او اي تطبيق محادثة فقط بانزال مركز الاشعارات

خصائص و مميزات تطبيق الأذكار و الأدعية "أذكاري":

* أذكار الصباح, أذكار المساء أذكار النوم و غيرها من أذكار اليوم و اليلة

* رسائل اذكاري لتلقي اذكار و أدعية جديدة
* بوصلة القبلة, تعمل بدون انترنت
* صفحة بماذا تشعر؟ الاذكار مصنفة حسب الشعور
* المسبحة الاكترونية الذكية!
* ظهور الاذكار و الأدعية على مركز الاشعارات, ليساعدك ان لا تنسى ذكرك الله ابدا
* بامكانك اضافة اذكارك او ادعيتك الخاصة بك، لتظهر بشكل تلقائي على مركز الاشعارات
* استهلاك "أذكاري" للبطارية شيء لا يذكر. فقد تم تحسين ادائه و تجريبه ليقدم لك باحسن ادائه.
* يمكنك تصميم اشعار الذكر بنفسك فيمكنك تغيير لون خلفية اشعار الذكر, حجم و شكل خط الذكر..والمزيد..
* والمزيد من الميزات الرائعة التي تنتظرك لتكتشفها في برنامج أذكاري...

• No configuration required, works out of the box.
• Sound and Vibration Alerts.
• Shows Prayer times for: Fajr, Ishraaq, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha.
• Shows Islamic date and gregorian date.

Because app uses your device's location settings to give you prayer times, please kindly be aware your location settings are open and up to date.

DClock is a useful flip clock and the interface design exquisitely. It looks great and is easily visible from across the room so you always know what time it is. There is flip animation display when time changes.

Features:
【Minimalist Design】Less is more.
【iOS14 Widgets】Support newest clock widgets on iPhone
【Rich Themes】DIY your own clock themes
【White Noise】Focus on your study
【Pomodoro Timer】Focus on your task
【Inspirational Quotations】Add your own quotes
【Alarm Clock】Variety of alarm clock musics
【Floating Clock】Always float on your screen

You can see your health data such as daily step in new clock themes.

Your support is greatly appreciated.

Tips: 
DClock optionally integrates with apple health.  this data is used to display your steps and walking distance if you select one of those themes.

Omani Orphanage Society is considered as a nonprofit organization which was established at 10/02/2014 royal decree No. 14 / 2000. The application helps speeding and securing donating process. 

This application allows you to:
- eases donation process. 
- participating in Bahja stories by documenting and sharing news and events. 
- donate an idea using a form. 
- sharing donations with your beloved people.
